data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Monterrey in the half of Queretaro.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Monterrey throw-in in Queretaro's half.
In the minute 4, Fernando Guerrero awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Fernando Guerrero awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
In the minute 8, Free kick Queretaro.
Maximiliano Meza of Monterrey gets in a strike, but is off target.
Queretaro have a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Matias Kranevitter is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Monterrey needs to be cautious. Queretaro have an attacking throw-in.
Queretaro's Fernando Madrigal misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 13, It's a goal kick for the away team in Santiago de Queretaro.
Matias Kranevitter is back on his feet again.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 14, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Monterrey.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, Monterrey to take a throw-in in Queretaro territory.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Monterrey's Ake Arnaud Loba breaks free at Estadio La Corregidora. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro pushes forward through Kevin Escamilla, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
In the minute 24, Hugo Silveira (Queretaro) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
Fernando Guerrero awards Queretaro a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Queretaro to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Monterrey throw-in in Queretaro's half.
Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
In the minute 28, Fernando Madrigal for Queretaro gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio La Corregidora.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
In the minute 32, Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monterrey have a goal kick.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 35, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Queretaro.
Monterrey are coming forward and Rogelio Funes Mori gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Santiago de Queretaro.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
In Santiago de Queretaro, Arturo Gonzalez of Monterrey is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In the minute 38, Monterrey's Daniel Alexis Parra is on target but unsuccessful.
In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Queretaro.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Monterrey in the half of Queretaro.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Throw-in for Queretaro close to the penalty box.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Santiago de Queretaro Queretaro attack through Kevin Escamilla. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 44, Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio La Corregidora.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Free kick Monterrey.
In the minute 45, Arturo Gonzalez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Monterrey.
Fernando Guerrero blows to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Monterrey.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a throw-in for Queretaro, close to Monterrey's area.
In the minute 52, Throw-in Monterrey.
Important block from the Queretaro defence as Ake Arnaud Loba fires in a strike for Monterrey.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Monterrey to take a throw-in in Queretaro territory.
In the minute 57, Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Monterrey.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 62, Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
Antonio Mohamed is making the team's first substitution at Estadio La Corregidora with Aviles Hurtado replacing Ake Arnaud Loba.
In the minute 63, Queretaro are pushing forward but Angel Sepulveda's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santiago de Queretaro.
Antonio Mohamed (Monterrey) is making a second substitution, with Carlos Rodriguez replacing Celso Ortiz.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
In the minute 64, Throw-in high up the field for Monterrey in Santiago de Queretaro.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Monterrey's Rogelio Funes Mori attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 67, Fernando Guerrero awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 68, Fernando Guerrero awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Monterrey.
In Santiago de Queretaro Queretaro attack through Hugo Silveira. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Queretaro throw-in in Monterrey's half.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Throw-in for Monterrey at Estadio La Corregidora.
Goal! Arturo Gonzalez gives Monterrey a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 72, Great play from Rogelio Funes Mori to set up the goal.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Monterrey in the half of Queretaro.
Fernando Guerrero awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 77, Monterrey have a goal kick.
Omar Arellano is replacing Kevin Escamilla for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
In the minute 79, Monterrey are in shooting range from this free kick.
Jonathan Betancourt is on a sub for Angel Sepulveda for Queretaro.
Monterrey's Maximiliano Meza gets in a shot on goal at Estadio La Corregidora. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 80, Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
The away team have replaced Arturo Gonzalez with Miguel Layun. This is the third substitution made today by Antonio Mohamed.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
In the minute 82, Can Monterrey capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Queretaro's half?
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Queretaro.
Queretaro make their third substitution with Sebastian Sosa replacing Hugo Silveira.
In the minute 85, The home team have replaced Erik Vera with Jonathan Perlaza. This is the fourth substitution made today by Alex Diego.
Own goal! Kevin Ramirez has scored at the wrong end to make it 1-1.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Stefan Medina scores with a header and the away team now lead 1-2.
Miguel Layun with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
In Santiago de Queretaro, Jonathan Betancourt (Queretaro) misses the target with a header.
Monterrey have a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Queretaro throw-in in Monterrey's half.
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
Queretaro have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fernando Guerrero blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
The away team replace Maximiliano Meza with Shayr Mohamed.
